code: import"./App.css";import{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import baseUrl from"./baseUrl";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Create(){const navigate=useNavigate();const[user,setUser]=useState({name:"",lastName:""});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setUser(prev=>{return{...prev,[name]:value};});};const saveData=e=>{e.preventDefault();axios.post("".concat(baseUrl,"/create"),user).then(res=>console.log(res)).catch(err=>console.log(err));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Create"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"name",onChange:handleChange,name:"name",value:user.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"last name",onChange:handleChange,name:"lastName",value:user.lastName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:saveData,children:"Save to MongoDB"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate(-1),children:"Back"})]});}
